cause_of_action: Dispute over costs following dismissal of judicial review application
procedure_followed: Exchange of materials, submissions from both parties, assessment by Officer
decision_reasoning: Applicant claims bill is invalid due to delay, but Supreme Court Rule 83(2) does not apply in Federal Court. Specific cost items were reviewed for reasonableness and relevance
conclusion_outcome: Respondent's Bill of Costs is partially allowed at $1,756.99 after disallowing certain items and disbursements
